channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 意大利能源巨头 Enel 暂停出售在阿根廷的子公司 Edesur，因为公司高管对哈维尔-米莱伊推动放松能源行业管制充满希望
item.description:
Italian energy giant Enel suspends the sale of subsidiary Edesur in Argentina as executives become hopeful about Javier Milei’s push to deregulate the sector https://t.co/xKGJQlv203

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 在政府努力缓解生活成本压力后，澳大利亚家庭和小型企业的能源账单可能从 7 月份开始下降
item.description:
Energy bills for Australian households and small businesses may fall from July, after government efforts to relieve cost-of-living pressures https://t.co/loOHd22cL6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将承诺改革英国财政部，将经济增长 "硬性 "纳入财政规划，她将阐述工党政府的经济愿景
item.description:
Rachel Reeves will promise to reform the UK Treasury to “hardwire” economic growth into its fiscal planning, as she sets out her economic vision for a Labour government https://t.co/1LgpkLeBQv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 新西兰总理克里斯托弗-卢克松受邀访华，中国政府试图阻止新西兰加入《奥库斯安全公约
item.description:
New Zealand PM Christopher Luxon has been invited to visit China as Beijing seeks to discourage his country from joining the Aukus security pact https://t.co/sYhbCAvKm7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）向近 100 个国家提供的贷款额接近创纪录的水平，这表明它在应对大流行病后世界的危险方面发挥着越来越大的后盾作用。
item.description:
The IMF is lending near a record amount to almost 100 countries, evidence of its growing role as a backstop against the dangers of the post-pandemic world https://t.co/t46PTrI8tD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 霸菱与野村支持的科林西亚之间的法律之争表明，私人信贷市场对经验丰富的人才的争夺是何等激烈
item.description:
A legal battle between Barings and Nomura-backed Corinthia illustrates just how fierce the competition is for experienced talent in the private credit market https://t.co/6LfflY0JSc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 日本央行周二似乎将自 2007 年以来首次加息，同时还将取消包括收益率曲线控制计划在内的非正统措施
item.description:
The Bank of Japan appears set to raise interest rates for the first time since 2007, while also axing unorthodox measures including its yield curve control program Tuesday https://t.co/ehpaKOxu6X

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 两家长期以来对中国股市持谨慎态度的全球基金转而看涨，这是投资者信心恢复的最新迹象
item.description:
Two global funds long cautious about Chinese equities have turned bullish, the latest indication of recovering investor confidence https://t.co/BBantIlQdG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: #5Things：日本央行拉开了本周央行大戏的序幕。高盛改变了对美联储的预测。中国恒大被指虚报收入。以下是市场动向。
item.description:
#5Things: The Bank of Japan kicks of a big week for central banks. Goldman Sachs has shifted its Fed predictions. And China Evergrande is accused of falsely inflating revenue. Here’s what’s moving markets. https://t.co/ZVjkBziR2r

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋展示新芯片，旨在扩大公司在人工智能计算领域的主导地位

item.title: 美国最大的风能和太阳能发电厂开发商预计，随着人工智能、电气化、云计算能力和芯片工厂的发展，电力需求的增长率将急剧上升。
item.description:
The biggest US wind and solar farm developer expects the growth rate of the demand for electricity to soar to keep up with artificial intelligence, electrification, cloud capacity and chip factories. https://t.co/ZDSGiRuCTY

item.title: 在经历了惊人的下跌之后，加密货币又回来了，比特币正在创下历史新高。加密货币的反弹会持续多久？收听 Big Take 播客
item.description:
After a stunning fall, crypto is back and Bitcoin is hitting all-time highs. Will the crypto rally last? Listen to the Big Take podcast https://t.co/YJD0i3rzzh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 房价上涨正在削减离开纽约前往佛罗里达州和德克萨斯州的人们的积蓄：晚间简报
item.description:

item.title: 英国防务公司 BAE 系统公司正在为公司债券销售向投资者征询意见，此次销售额可能高达 40 亿美元，以帮助该公司为收购波尔宇航公司（Ball Aerospace）所使用的过桥贷款进行再融资。
item.description:
UK defense company BAE Systems is sounding out investors for a corporate bond sale that could top $4 billion to help refinance a bridge loan it used to acquire Ball Aerospace https://t.co/kgTIBN5xnb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 美国汽油期货创下六个月新高，原因是俄罗斯炼油厂生产中断和美国燃料库存减少加剧了夏季驾车出行前的供应担忧。
item.description:
US gasoline futures hit a six-month high as disruptions at Russian oil refineries and dwindling US fuel stockpiles exacerbate supply concerns ahead of summer driving months. https://t.co/ulYFgYaQaE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 全球市值第三大公司英伟达（Nvidia）正在变成 "YOLO "交易人群的赌场。
item.description:
Nvidia, the world’s third-largest company by market value, is turning into a casino for the YOLO trading crowd. https://t.co/1NkRFGbpz5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 加密货币交易所 OKX 将终止对欧洲经济区用户使用 Tether 的 USDT 代币进行数字货币交易的支持。
item.description:
Crypto exchange OKX is ending its support of digital currencies traded against Tether’s USDT token for users based in the European Economic Area. https://t.co/BU00ycbM97

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 康菲石油公司首席执行官瑞安-兰斯说，拜登政府暂停液化天然气出口许可的做法必须在 11 月总统大选后结束。
item.description:
The Biden administration’s pause on liquefied natural gas export licenses needs to end after November’s presidential election, said ConocoPhillips CEO Ryan Lance. https://t.co/CM2ePuvb2f

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 随着工资增长的加快，日本央行可能在本周二自 2007 年以来首次提高利率
item.description:
The BOJ may increase interest rates on Tuesday for the first time since 2007 as wage growth picks up https://t.co/nkabGFRQ6Y

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: Bakkt 任命了新的首席执行官和总裁，因为该加密货币交易和托管平台因未能满足上市要求而面临被纽约证券交易所除名的命运

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 联邦调查局监控了世界顶级石油交易商长达数年的贿赂计划，揭露了全球大宗商品交易中的腐败现象。我们有录音带
item.description:
The FBI monitored a years-long bribery scheme by the world‘s top oil trader, shining light on corruption in global commodity trading. We have the tapes https://t.co/9MtZc78uu8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 自去年银行业危机以来，一直笼罩在美国信贷市场流动性不足一角的风险似乎已悄然消失。
item.description:
A risk that’s been hanging over an illiquid corner of the US credit market since last year’s banking crisis seems to have been quietly taken off the table. https://t.co/rW9iWKf3r0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 自 10 月 1 日财政年度开始以来，美国国会第六次面临政府关门的可能，因为资金谈判已进入最后阶段
item.description:
For the sixth time since the fiscal year started Oct. 1, Congress is staring at a possible government shutdown as negotiations on funding go down to the wire https://t.co/pM89qX3tTI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 摩根士丹利财富管理公司（Morgan Stanley Wealth Management）首席投资官向股票多头发出警告：压制美元的结构性力量有可能反过来波及美国股市
item.description:
The chief investment officer of Morgan Stanley Wealth Management has a warning for stock bulls: the structural forces weighing on the dollar are threatening to spread to US equities in turn https://t.co/moBMUHkp41

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024
